alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Edgefield and central Aiken Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgefield County Airport, or 12 miles north of Belvedere, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Edgefield, USC Aiken, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, Edgefield County Airport, Graniteville, Trenton, Hopeland Gardens, Mt Vintage, Vaucluse, New Holland and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 9 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
